CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverleaf Emporium relative to Crimson Bazaar?
SRP.A: Silverleaf Emporium is {below} Crimson Bazaar in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Nova Exchange?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {above} Nova Exchange in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Exchange relative to Silverleaf Emporium?
SRP.A: Nova Exchange is {above} Silverleaf Emporium in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Market}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Bazaar}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Exchange's minimum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Exchange's minimum Price Index is in {1951}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Bazaar's minimum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Bazaar's minimum Price Index is in {1968}.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1975, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1963 and 1966?
NC.A: The change in total price index between 1970 and 1975 was {larger} than between 1963 and 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1968, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1955 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total price index between 1952 and 1968 was {smaller} than between 1955 and 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1976, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1962 and 1977?
NC.A: The change in total price index between 1967 and 1976 was {smaller} than between 1962 and 1977.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1967 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total price index in 1967 was {lower} than in 1977.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Market} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Ironwood Market and Silverleaf Emporium first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Ironwood Market and Silverleaf Emporium did not exchange leading positions.
